text: sahrab brrda phu txb snxng tx phracea khxng phwk khea khux kar di rab khwam di læa brrda phu mi txb snxng tx phraxngkh mæwa phwk khea ca mi thanghmd thi mi xyu nı phændin læa mi xik yeiyng nan phwk khea ca yxm xea ma thi thosʹ xyang nænxn chn hela nan sahrab phwk khea khun kar mi baychi thi chaw læa thi phanak khxng phwk khea khux nrk yahannan man pen thi phanak thi chawcha ying
